text:
A Hot Evening in July

A young man hesitates on a bridge.  
It's uncomfortably warm tonight.  

Young Man: I need to get out of here.  
Young Man: What am I even doing?  

---
A cramped garret under a rooftop.  
He avoids his landlady, feeling anxious.  

Young Man: Just a little longer...  
Young Man: I can't face her now.

**PAGE SUMMARY:** A young man hesitates as he leaves his cramped garret on a hot July evening.
